title: internet gateway
extract: An Internet gateway is a network "node" that connects two different networks that use different protocols (rules) for communicating. ... If you have a Wi-Fi connection at home, your Internet gateway is the modem or modem/router combination that your ISP provides so that you connect to the Internet through their network.
extract_html: An Internet gateway is a network "node" that connects two different networks that use different protocols (rules) for communicating. ... If you have a Wi-Fi connection at home, your Internet gateway is the modem or modem/router combination that your ISP provides so that you connect to the Internet through their network.
